title: [Large-Scale] Metacognitive Blended Learning Design for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Science curriculum content knowledge and basic proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Metacognitive strategy training course combining digital devices and offline activities, aimed at strengthening lesson design capabilities for in-service elementary science teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) to science lesson design.
Learners can utilize two or more tools for self-directed recording and analysis of learning processes using digital platforms (LMS).
Learners can revise and optimize their lesson designs two or more times based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
